articles.description: Wales are held to a 1-1 draw by Turkey in Cardiff and now face a play-off semi-final in March after Croatia pip them to automatic Euro 2024 qualification.
articles.title: Wales must settle for play-offs after Turkey draw

articles.description: The Republic of Ireland fail to end a disappointing year on a high as they are held by New Zealand in James McClean's final international game.
articles.title: Republic held by New Zealand as McClean retires

articles.description: Newcastle United will be permitted to loan players from the Saudi Pro League in January following a vote by Premier League clubs.
articles.title: Newcastle cleared to sign Saudi Pro League players

articles.description: England back row Ben Earl will be available for the start of the Six Nations after Saracens receive a positive update on his knee problem.
articles.title: Earl fit for Six Nations after injury scare

articles.description: Anthony Mullally lifted the biggest prize in northern hemisphere rugby league, but his emptiness on doing so led him to a life far from the bright lights and big stage.
articles.title: The remote retreats shaping men and medal prospects

articles.description: Manager Gareth Southgate praises England's "excellent" mentality after they come from behind to draw in North Macedonia in their final Euro 2024 qualifier.
articles.title: 'Excellent' England mentality pleases Southgate

articles.description: Arsenal forward Beth Mead is back in Sarina Wiegman's England squad for the first time in over a year after recovering from an ACL injury.
articles.title: Mead returns to England squad after year out

articles.description: Ante Budimir's goal sees Croatia beat Armenia and secure the final automatic qualification spot for Euro 2024.
articles.title: Croatia secure final automatic Euro 2024 spot

articles.description: Transgender women are barred from playing in international women's matches under new International Cricket Council regulations.
articles.title: ICC bans trans women from women's internationals

articles.description: A Harvey Elliot double helps England beat Northern Ireland comfortably in their 2025 Euro Under-21 Championship qualifier.
articles.title: Elliot double helps England U21 beat Northern Ireland
